ygData.subject: banded gloves
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings all.... One quick question. I have been doing smithing for what seems like forever and am way above master level. However, in all my time of smithing
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings all....
One quick question. I have been doing smithing for what seems like
forever and am way above master level. However, in all my time of smithing
I have yet to see or find a mold for banded gloves though I've had many
MANY customers request them. Does anyone know if banded gloves even exist
and if so are there molds to make them or must they be bought from
merchant...and if there are molds to make them...where the heck are they
hiding them?? lol Thanks much for any help. ;)

Twilite
